---
title: "Fig 2c: total number of unique peptides per mAb"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r, include=FALSE, message=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

source(here::here("setup.R"))
source(here::here("src", "get_n_peptides.R"))
source(here::here("src", "plotting", "plot_total_number_of_peptides_per_mab.R"))
```

```{r}
df <- read_tsv(here("data", "processed", "peptides_preprocessed_TP_FP.tsv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
```

# Main

```{r}
stats <- get_n_unique_peptides_per_mab(df)
```

```{r, fig.height=4, fig.width=4}
plot_total_number_of_peptides_per_mab(stats[stats$match_ig_type %in% HC_names, ])
```

# Supplementary

```{r, fig.height=4, fig.width=4}
plot_total_number_of_peptides_per_mab(stats[stats$match_ig_type %in% LC_names, ])
```
